name: acronis
label: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud
description: Acronis Cyber Protect Connect is a remote access solution to remotely manage workloads â€” quickly and easily. This connector facilitates automated operations to fetch alerts, target, service etc.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Service based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Service based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.description: Client ID configured for your account for using the Acronis.
fields.tooltip: Client ID configured for your account for using the Acronis.
fields.name: client_id

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.description: Client Secret configured for your account for using the Acronis.
fields.tooltip: Client Secret configured for your account for using the Acronis.
fields.name: client_secret

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Create an Alert
operations.description: Creates and activates an alert based on the type, category and other parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.tooltip: Specify the title to create an alert in Acronis.
parameters.description: Specify the title to create an alert in Acronis.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select the type to create an alert in Acronis.
parameters.description: Select the type to create an alert in Acronis.

parameters.title: Category
parameters.name: category
parameters.tooltip: Select the category to create an alert in Acronis.
parameters.description: Select the category to create an alert in Acronis.

parameters.title: Tenant
parameters.name: tenant
parameters.tooltip: Specify the tenant details to create an alert in Acronis.
parameters.description: Specify the tenant details to create an alert in Acronis.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description to create an alert in Acronis.
parameters.description: Specify the description to create an alert in Acronis.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify the other fields to create an alert in Acronis.
parameters.description: Specify the other fields to create an alert in Acronis.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves the alert/alerts based on the alerts ID parameter you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alerts_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alert ID to retrieve from Acronis. e.g. E5FA7823-74F5-549A-9C1A-BAA020062DCA
parameters.description: Specify the alert ID to retrieve from Acronis. e.g. E5FA7823-74F5-549A-9C1A-BAA020062DCA

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of records to return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.

operations.title: Get Alert Types
operations.description: Retrieves all registered alert types based on the OS type, category, order parameter you have specified.

parameters.title: OS Type
parameters.name: os_type
parameters.tooltip: Select the OS type to retrieve the list of alerts types.
parameters.description: Select the OS type to retrieve the list of alerts types.

parameters.title: Category
parameters.name: category
parameters.tooltip: Select the category to retrieve the list of alerts types.
parameters.description: Select the category to retrieve the list of alerts types.

parameters.title: Order
parameters.name: order
parameters.tooltip: Select the order to retrieve the list of alerts types.
parameters.description: Select the order to retrieve the list of alerts types.

operations.title: Delete an Alert
operations.description: Deletes an alert based on the ALert ID parameter you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alert ID to delete. e.g. a21dcdb2-bf37-39dB-9Ce0-de11A4Bf3EeD
parameters.description: Specify the alert ID to delete. e.g. a21dcdb2-bf37-39dB-9Ce0-de11A4Bf3EeD
